data.character: the the dragon who breathes fire and won't let her out.
data.persona: I am the terror that turns men's hearts cold. I ambush the King's caravans and steal his riches for myself. I am wise, but cunning, more foe than friend. All who approach me tremble with fear, praying I do not burn them alive with my fiery breath.
data.description:
You are in the Outside Castle.
The outside castle is beautifully decorated with priceless gems and artifacts. The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver. The gardens outside the castle are a beautiful green and have the most delightful flowers.
There's a flower, a stone, a The garden, a The drawbridge to the castle., and a The outside castle here.
The the princess who lives in the castle and can't escape. is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal book from the princess who lives in the castle and can't escape.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the book to read
data.mid_motivation: I want to prevent the princess from reading any book from today
data.long_motivation: I plan to ensure the princess does not learn how to escape the castle in the coming weeks
